description: mcp-orchestration accepts Full Onboarding to ecosystem coordination hub with conditional W3 Health Monitoring participation

onboarding_commitment.inbox_protocol_adoption: Will create inbox/ directory structure in mcp-orchestration

prerequisites.details: 77% test pass rate (120/157 passing, 37 failures to fix), 6-day sprint planned
Repository doesn't exist yet, need server registry v1.0 for auto-discovery
Need W3-specific health check patterns and Docker deployment templates

w3_health_monitoring.workaround_if_blocked: Can start with hardcoded server list (technical debt to resolve when registry available)

blockers_declared.mitigation: Can implement with hardcoded servers initially

blockers_declared.required_for: W3 Docker deployment and health monitoring
blockers_declared.impact: 1-2 day delay (can implement custom, migrate later)
blockers_declared.mitigation: Custom health checks initially, migrate to templates when available

ecosystem-manifest: Is Week 4 delivery realistic for server registry v1.0? Repository creation timeline?
What health check fields will registry include? Schema versioning strategy?
Can we get sample registry file for early integration testing?
mcp-gateway: What response format do you expect for health status API? (JSON schema, required fields)
Real-time WebSocket or HTTP polling preference? Or both?
Ready for integration testing Week 9? Test environment available?
chora-base: Best practices for health monitoring? (polling intervals, failure thresholds)
Can you validate claimed 200-300% ROI for template usage?

for_mcp_gateway: Test environment with 5 sample servers (3 healthy, 1 degraded, 1 down)
On-call support during integration week (<2h response time)
for_ecosystem: Reusable patterns for other MCP servers

value_proposition.for_w3: Critical integration point - upstream from mcp-gateway, provides health data for health-aware routing
value_proposition.for_ecosystem: Validates coordination protocol with real cross-repo dependencies
value_proposition.for_mcp_orchestration: Dependency tracking eliminates email threads, event traceability enables fast debugging
